scripts.build:www: cross-env NODE_ENV=development DIR=www npx webpack --config server/build/webpack-server-config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DIR=www npx webpack --config server/build/webpack-client-config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DIR=www npx webpack --config server/build/webpack-no-ssr-config.js
scripts.build:master: cross-env NODE_ENV=production DIR=www npx webpack --config server/build/webpack-server-config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production DIR=www npx webpack --config server/build/webpack-client-config.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production DIR=www npx webpack --config server/build/webpack-no-ssr-config.js
scripts.start:www: yarn build:master && cross-env NODE_ENV=production DIR=www node server/index.js
scripts.dev:www: yarn build:www && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DIR=www nodemon -e js,ts server/index.js
scripts.dev:wwwa: yarn build:www && cross-env NODE_ENV=development DIR=www nodemon -e js,ts --inspect-brk=9229 server/index.js
